pages.text: 26|137|In [oini mo hamon] ravisi pesinijon ast
26|138|va mo [hargiz] azoʙ naxohem sud»
26|139|Pas, onon Hudro duruƣgu angostand. Pas, Mo [niz] halokason kardem. Hatman, dar in [mocaro] nisonae [ʙaroi iʙrat giriftan] ast va ʙestarason mu'min naʙudand
26|140|Va ʙe tardid, Parvardigorat sikastnopaziri mehruʙon ast
26|141|[Qavmi] Samud pajomʙaronro duruƣgu angostand
26|142|On goh ki ʙarodarason Soleh ʙa onon guft: «Ojo [az Alloh taolo] parvo namekuned
26|143|Ba rosti, man ʙaroi sumo pajomʙari amin hastam
26|144|Pas, az Alloh taolo parvo kuned va mutei [dasturhoi] man ʙosed
26|145|Va man [dar ʙaroʙari risolatam] hec podose az sumo namexoham. Podosi man tanho ʙar [uhdai] Parvardigori cahonijon ast
26|146|Ojo [mepindored, ki] sumoro dar ne'mathoe, ki in cost, osuda raho mekunand
26|147|Dar [in] ʙoƣho va casmasorho
26|148|Va [dar kanori in] kistzorho va naxlhoe, ki mevahojas narmu rasidaast
26|149|Va mohirona az kuhho [ʙaroi xud] xonahoe metarosed
26|150|Pas, az Alloh taolo parvo kuned va mutei [dasturhoi] man ʙosed»
26|151|Va az isrofkoron [-i gunahgor] pajravi nakuned
26|152|[Hamon] Kasone, ki dar zamin ʙa fasod mepardozand va [xestanro] isloh namekunand”
26|153|Onon guftand: “[Ej Soleh] Cuz in nest, ki tu codusudai
26|154|Tu cuz ʙasare hammonandi mo nesti, pas, agar rost megui, nisonae [ʙar pajomʙariat] ʙijovar”
26|155|[Soleh] Guft: «In modasuturest, ki sahme az oʙ [-i casma] dorad va [ruzhoi muajjane niz] sumo sahme az oʙ dored
26|156|Pas, [kamtarin] ozore ʙa on narasoned, ki azoʙi ruzi ʙuzurg sumoro faro megirad”
26|157|Pas, onro [zaxmi kardand va] kustand va [on goh az kardai xud] pusajmon sudand
26|158|Pas, azoʙ [-i ilohi] ononro furu girift. Be gumon, dar in [mocaro] nisonae [ʙaroi iʙrat giriftan] ast va ʙestarason mu'min naʙudand
26|159|Va ʙe tardid, Parvardigorat hamon sikastnopaziri mehruʙon ast
